Articles.Content: I'm just wondering what has happened with 0.24. The devs said that 0.23.5 and 0.24 would be released on dates not very far apart, but it's been over a month now and there have been no new announcements on the forums as far as i have found. Just wondering what's happened to it.

Please be patient, you've only recently gotten 0.23.5, also release speculation is in the rules, as it can quickly spiral out of control.

Closing!
